Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A7284/S6489, known as the Wandering Officers Act, to prohibit the appointment of a person as a police officer if such person has previously been fired as a police officer from any jurisdiction.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
